name: B101
description:
Maxiess: I'm the writer and creator for the project. I'm a young guy that is always dreaming about something, this project being one of those things. This is all brand new to me, so I welcome your comments and suggestions.
FurAffinity
Twitter

Sean: Sean is the owner of Ottercorrect Literature Services, an editing and publishing company. He will be helping me fix the grammatical mistakes in the story, as well as help with basic coding bugs that might pop up and giving general project guidance. He is also open for more projects, if you're a writer of novels, visual novels, or pretty much anything else.
Website 
Twitter

hroft32: hroft32 or Andrew is our new artist. He is helping me with all the artwork, animation, audio, coding and new ideas for this project. 
FurAffinity
